Text.Page:
Leave the front to us. We'll stop them.
I want you to fly behind enemy lines in these flying machines.

If we encircle them, it'll be easier for us to defeat them.

Discuss everything else with the folks there.
See you later!
While Rhodos and his army carried out a frontal assault on the fortress, the Federation attacked the wall from the other side. You follow the Federation.

To get to the airship platform, you'll have to fight through the archdevas in the valley to the north.

Once clear, you can board your vessel.

I saw you fighting. You handle yourself well. Glad to know Seir still picks the best.

We need to recover some spare parts for the airship. It can't leave without them.

Find the boxes and get them to Garog.

Praise Kaia, you found them!

I'll get the airship working. You get aboard. The assault can finally begin!
This mission goes nowhere without those parts.
